CDMUtilities 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Function reference

    Utilities

    Create a mock cdm object

    mockCdm()
    It creates a mock cdm_reference.
    mockVocabularyCdm()
    It creates a mock database with the vocabulary.

    Check inputs

    checkInput()
    Check the input parameters in OMOP CDM Tools environment
    listInputCheck()
    List available inputs to check

    Export results to csv and zip files

    exportResults()
    Export list of results

    Temporary behaviour of cohorts

    setTemporary()
    Set temporary (or permanent) behavior for compute functions.

    Convert strings to snake_case or camelCase

    toSnakeCase()
    Convert a character to snake_case
    toCamelCase()
    Convert a character to camelCase

    Classes

    GeneratedCohortSet

    newGeneratedCohortSet()
    CdmReference objects constructor.
    validateGeneratedCohortSet()
    To assess if an object is a valid GeneratedCohortSet.

    CdmReference

    newCdmReference()
    CdmReference objects constructor
    validateCdmReference()
    Validate a CdmReferenceObject.

    Methods

    Bind more than one element from the same class

    bind()
    Bind two or more objects of the same class.
    bind(<cdm_reference>)
    Bind multiple cdm_reference objects.
    bind(<GeneratedCohortSet>)
    Bind multiple GeneratedCohortSet objects.

    Export one element to a tibble

    export()
    Export an object.
    export(<cdm_reference>)
    Export a cdm_reference
    export(<GeneratedCohortSet>)
    Export a GeneratedCohortSet.

    CohortSet of a GeneratedCohortSet

    cohortSet()
    Get cohort settings from a GeneratedCohortSet object.

    CohortAttrition of a GeneratedCohortSet

    cohortAttrition()
    Get cohort attrition from a GeneratedCohortSet object.

    CohortCount of a GeneratedCohortSet

    cohortCount()
    Get cohort counts from a GeneratedCohortSet object.

    cdm_reference utilities

    print(<cdm_reference>)
    Print a CDM reference object
    `[[`(<cdm_reference>)
    Subset a cdm reference object
    `$`(<cdm_reference>)
    Subset a cdm reference object
